home.description: This is a simple Vue.js application.

hero.title: Master Typing with Speed and Precision
hero.subtitle: Improve your typing skills with personalized lessons, daily challenges, and real-time feedback.
hero.typingExample: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog...

feature1.title: Progressive Learning
feature1.description: Start with the basics and advance through increasingly challenging levels at your own pace.

feature2.title: Daily Challenges
feature2.description: Keep your skills sharp with new daily exercises and compete with other typists worldwide.

feature3.title: Detailed Analytics
feature3.description: Track your progress with comprehensive metrics on speed, accuracy, and problem areas.

step1.title: Create an Account
step1.description: Sign up for free and create your personalized typing profile.

step2.title: Take a Test
step2.description: Complete an initial assessment to determine your current typing level.

step3.title: Practice Daily
step3.description: Follow your customized practice plan and complete daily challenges.

step4.title: Track Progress
step4.description: Monitor your improvement over time and see your ranking among other users.

cta.title: Ready to Type Faster?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who have improved their typing skills with ClicKey.

footer.tagline: Become a typing master, one key at a time.

login.resetInstructions: Enter your email address, and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
login.resetSuccess: Password reset link sent! Check your email.
login.emailPasswordRequired: Please enter both email and password

validation.emailValid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

practice.instructions: Choose your difficulty level and click Start to begin the typing test.
